message_1:
What is the degree of membership of the number 7 in the fuzzy set A defined by the membership function: 

µA(x) = 1/[(x-5)²+1] 

where x is the input value and µA(x) denotes the degree of membership of x in the set A?
message_2:
To find the degree of membership of the number 7 in the fuzzy set A, we need to substitute x = 7 into the membership function µA(x).

µA(x) = 1/[(x-5)²+1]

µA(7) = 1/[(7-5)²+1]
µA(7) = 1/[(2)²+1]
µA(7) = 1/[4+1]
µA(7) = 1/5

Therefore, the degree of membership of the number 7 in the fuzzy set A is 1/5 or 0.2.
